forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 39F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 39F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 13C. ENE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. NE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
